title: Native desktop application â€“ third-party components and device capabilities
mainAdvice: Let buyers know about any third-party components or device capabilities needed for your Catalogue Solution.

third-party-components.additionalAdvice: Provide information on any third-party components required for your Catalogue Solution to function, for example integration software, such as a QR code scanner, or Google search.

errorResponse.maxLength: Third-party components response must be 500 characters or fewer

device-capabilities.additionalAdvice: Provide information on any device capabilities required for your Catalogue Solution to function, for example a camera or a certain type of connection port.

errorResponse.maxLength: Device capabilities response must be 500 characters or fewer
